channel.title: How to start on moparcraft
channel.description:
first day that i play real minecrft with online account i bought... :D so awsome
butt now i wanna know how to join moparcraft
evrytime i login i try to walk and set back and have to do /login and /register but none of them working lol... keep setting back
how to play, anddddddd if i can play where can i build a house in what city :D?

item.title: How to start on moparcraft
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/topic,492512.0.html

That includes how to play, and how to login. Also, for the building locations I would just walk until you find a suitable area or use the world map to find a nice location.

http://www.moparisthebest.com/worldmap/

Read full topic
